channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 一部のパブリッシャはGoogleのPrivacy Sandboxをテストし続ける予定だが、GoogleがChromeからのCookie非推奨化を再び延期したため、それ以上のリソースを割くことはない（Kayleigh Barber/Digiday）
item.description:
Kayleigh Barber / Digiday:
Some publishers plan to keep testing Google's Privacy Sandbox but won't allocate further resources to it, as Google delays cookie deprecation from Chrome again  —  Publishers could see the writing on the wall when it came to Google's announcement that it was delaying cookie deprecation from Chrome yet again.

item.title: 情報筋中国系メディア、アジア最高権威のジャーナリズム賞SOPAへの応募を中止 海外の「癒着」避ける中国政府の圧力で（日経アジア）
item.description:
Nikkei Asia:
Sources: Chinese-owned media stopped submissions to Asia's highest-profile journalism prize SOPA due to Chinese government pressure to avoid foreign “collusion”  —  Outlets stop SOPA submissions under pressure to avoid foreign ‘collusion’  —  Nationalists have attacked Chinese media …

item.title: バークシャーは2023年末時点で6330万株のパラマウント株を保有していた。
item.description:
Yun Li / CNBC:
Warren Buffett says Berkshire sold its entire Paramount stake and “lost quite a bit of money”; Berkshire owned 63.3M shares of Paramount as of the end of 2023  —  WATCH NOW  —  Warren Buffett says Berkshire sold its entire Paramount stake and ‘lost quite a bit of money’

item.title: ランウェイの第2回国際AI映画祭の様子。2023年には300本だったショートビデオの応募が、2024年には3000本に増え、10本のファイナリストが選ばれた（Rachel Metz/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Rachel Metz / Bloomberg:
A look at Runway's second International AI Film Festival, which it says grew from 300 short-video submissions in 2023 to 3,000 in 2024 with 10 finalists chosen  —  Artificial intelligence has changed filmmaking a lot over the past year, even though the technology is just getting started.  But first...

item.title: 研究者グループによると、Twitchはますますニュースソースになりつつあり、伝統的なニュースメディアは収入増と視聴者エンゲージメントのためにTwitchを利用することができる（Matt Cooper/University of Oregon）
item.description:
Matt Cooper / University of Oregon:
A group of researchers say Twitch is increasingly becoming a news source, and traditional news outlets could use it for added income and audience engagement  —  The popular app Twitch, created to livestream video game action, is redefining journalism as it becomes a source for news, University of Oregon research found.

item.title: AIが生成したWashed OutのThe Hardest Partのミュージックビデオは、OpenAIのSoraを使用して作成された。
item.description:
Wendy Lee / Los Angeles Times:
How the AI-generated music video for Washed Out's The Hardest Part was created entirely using OpenAI's Sora, a first from a major record label  —  “The Hardest Part,” a new song from indie pop artist Washed Out, is all about love lost, among the most human of themes.

item.title: グーグル、広告ポリシーを更新し、2024年5月30日から、合成性的コンテンツを生成、配信、保存するサービスの宣伝を禁止（Barry Schwartz/Search Engine Roundtable）
item.description:
Barry Schwartz / Search Engine Roundtable:
Google updates its ad policy to ban the promotion of services that generate, distribute, or store synthetic sexually explicit content, starting May 30, 2024  —  Google Ads, Shopping Ads, Admob, and other Google Ads products will soon disallow deepfake sexual content, synthetic sexually explicit content …

item.title: ポスト・ミレニアル紙とヒューマン・イベント紙のウェブサイトが5月2日遅くにハッキングされ、改ざんされた。
item.description:
AJ Vicens / CyberScoop:
The Post Millennial and Human Events websites were hacked and defaced late May 2, initially with links added to datasets of subscribers, writers, and editors  —  The hack included links to download subscriber data and a message claiming that Post Millennial's editor was transitioning to a woman.

item.title: AI企業に対するニュースパブリッシャーの相反するアプローチと、データマーケットプレイスの欠如がいかに買い手と売り手の料金設定を難しくしているかを考察（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
A look at news publishers' conflicting approaches toward AI companies, and how the lack of a data marketplace makes it hard for buyers and sellers to set rates  —  - The new suits add heft to the Times' claims. … Several other large news publishers, including the Financial Times …

item.title: X、Grok AIがキュレーションし要約したニュースを提供する「Stories on X」を開始、プレミアム会員向けにiOSとウェブのExploreタブで提供（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
X launches Stories on X, with news curated and summarized by Grok AI, available for Premium subscribers in the Explore tab on iOS and on the web  —  X, formerly Twitter, is now using Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok to power a feature that summarizes the personalized trending stories in the app's Explore section.

item.title: 書簡の中で、州の選挙管理官を務める複数の民主党議員は、2020年の選挙が盗まれたと主張する広告を許可する政策を廃止するようメタに要請している（Christina A. Cassidy/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Christina A. Cassidy / Associated Press:
In a letter, several Democrats serving as their state's top election officials ask Meta to repeal a policy allowing ads that claim the 2020 election was stolen  —  Several Democrats serving as their state's top election officials have sent a letter to the parent company of Facebook …

item.title: 情報筋：パラマウント・グローバル社では、スカイダンス-レッドバード、ソニー・ピクチャーズ-アポロの2つのオファーはどちらも実現しないと見ている（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Sources: the expectation at Paramount Global is that neither of the two offers in play, Skydance-RedBird and Sony Pictures-Apollo, will come to fruition  —  After months of M&A talks, Paramount Global and controlling shareholder Shari Redstone might be going it alone after all.

item.title: イーロン・マスクは、Grokが記事本文を見ずにXの投稿だけを頼りにニュースの要約を作成することを望んでおり、記事の引用も改善されると述べている（Alex Kantrowitz/Big Technology）。
item.description:
Alex Kantrowitz / Big Technology:
Elon Musk says he wants Grok to create news summaries by relying solely on X posts, without looking at article text, and improved story citations are coming  —  Musk emails with details on AI-powered news inside X. An AI bot will summarize news and commentary, sometimes looking through tens of thousands of posts per story.

item.title: ルーシー・フレイザー英文化相にインタビュー、レッドバードIMIによるテレグラフ買収阻止、外国人持ち株比率を5％に制限する計画などについて（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
An interview with UK culture secretary Lucy Frazer on blocking RedBird IMI's Telegraph takeover bid, plans to cap foreign state ownership at 5%, and more  —  Culture secretary says UK ‘not stopping’ foreign investment as she defends blocking sale to Abu Dhabi-backed company
